short_summary: M12 and M36 Parking Lot and Storm Sewer Rehabilitation
description: Rehabilitation of the parking lots and storm sewers at the National Research Council Canada's M-9, M-12, and M-36 buildings, located at 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, ON. The goal of the project is to repair and upgrade the existing parking lots and storm sewers to ensure they meet current safety and accessibility standards. The project also includes the installation of new storm sewer infrastructure and the rehabilitation of existing electrical and plumbing services.

**Request for Proposal: M12 and M36 Parking Lot and Storm Sewer Rehabilitation**
**Notice ID:** PW-23-01029564
**Solicitation Number:** 22-58122
**Publication Date:** 09 March 2023
**Closing Date:** 04 May 2023
**Publication Amendment Date:** 02 May 2023
**Expected Contract Start Date:** None
**Expected Contract End Date:** None
**Cancelling Solicitation Status:** Expired

The National Research Council Canada is soliciting responses from qualified contractors to perform a parking lot and storm sewer rehabilitation project at Council's buildings M-9, M-12 and M-36, located in the National Capital Region (NCR).

**Project Description:**
The work under this contract includes the rehabilitation of the parking lots and storm sewers at the M-9, M-12 and M-36 buildings. The successful contractor will be responsible for the execution of all necessary construction services.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
All Technical Proposals will be evaluated to determine if all mandatory requirements detailed in the "Mandatory Criteria" table have been met. Any Tender Form that fails to meet any of the mandatory requirements will be deemed non-compliant.

**Mandatory Site Visit:**
A mandatory site visit will be held on March 21st and 23rd, 2023, at 9:30 am. At least one representative from each bidder must attend the site visit. Bidders who fail to attend the site visit will be deemed non-responsive.

**Bidder Requirements:**
To be eligible to submit a bid, bidders must meet the following requirements:

* Hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD);
* Have at least 10 years of experience in executing road building and sewer projects;
* Provide two project examples of comparable value and client references.

**Tender Requirements:**
The successful bidder will be required to hold a valid WSIB certificate and comply with all security requirements.

**Important Dates:**

* Mandatory Site Visit: March 21st and 23rd, 2023
* Closing Date: 04 May 2023, 14:00
* Notice of Award: Subsequent to the closing date, notice will be posted on the Buy and Sell Website.
